long_description: The Powertraveller Powergorilla battery charger offers a convenient and portable power source for recharging laptops, netbooks, music players, e-readers, handheld game consoles, GPS units and more. Multivoltage functionality offers up to 6 hrs. of extra power when fully charged. Powergorilla can be charged via included international wall adapter or the Powertraveller Solargorilla (sold separately). The Powertraveller Powergorilla battery charger includes adapters and tips for all major laptop and mobile brands (Apple MagSafe not included). iPhone(R) 5 can be charged with a USB adapter (not included; available for purchase from Apple).
short_description: The Powertraveller Powergorilla battery charger offers a convenient and portable power source for recharging laptops, netbooks, music players, e-readers, handheld game consoles, GPS units and more.
